title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)) and the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Road Safety Authority (Commercial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Road Safety Authority (Commercial 
Vehicle Roadworthiness) Act 2012 (Section 43) (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited road safety authority (commercial vehicle roadworthiness) act 2012 (section 43) (commencement) order 2021

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)) and the
heading: 2. The 15th day of November 2021 is fixed as the day on which section 43
text_raw:
2. The 15th day of November 2021 is fixed as the day on which section 43 
of the Road Safety Authority (Commercial Vehicle Roadworthiness) Act 2012 
(No. 16 of 2012) comes into operation. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 3 November 2021 

HILDEGARDE NAUGHTON, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [575] 3
